references.paper_title: Highly parallel genome-wide expression profiling of individual cells using nanoliter droplets
references.reason: This paper is foundational for single-cell RNA sequencing technology, introducing a highly parallel method that enabled large-scale studies.

references.paper_title: Cell types in the mouse cortex and hippocampus revealed by single-cell RNA-seq
references.reason: This paper was highly influential in demonstrating single-cell RNA-seq's capability for discovering novel cell types in the brain.

references.paper_title: Pseudo-temporal ordering of individual cells reveals dynamics and regulators of cell fate decisions
references.reason: This paper introduced a method for ordering single cells along a trajectory, revealing cellular dynamics and regulatory mechanisms.

references.paper_title: Recovering gene interactions from single-cell data using data diffusion
references.reason: This paper presented MAGIC, a widely used imputation method that addresses the problem of missing values in scRNA-seq data using diffusion.

references.paper_title: An accurate and robust imputation method scimpute for single-cell RNA-seq data
references.reason: This paper introduced scimpute, another widely used imputation method that tackles the challenges of missing data in single-cell RNA sequencing.
